alert.note: Alert for Forrest (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Forrest County through 1215 AM CST... At 1200 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mclaurin, or 10 miles southeast of Hattiesburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hattiesburg, Mclaurin, Brooklyn, Sunrise and Rock Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Mississippi.
